statements: DELETE FROM SalesPerformance WHERE Region = 'North' AND ProductCategory = 'Electronics';
DELETE FROM SalesPerformance WHERE SalesID = 10 AND Region = 'North' AND SalesAmount > 1000;
DELETE FROM SalesPerformance WHERE SalesDate < '2021-08-10' AND ProductCategory = 'Electronics';
